abstract: Citigroup announced Wednesday that it had hired Deborah Doyle McWhinney, a former top executive of Charles Schwab, to head the bank’s efforts to expand its Citi Personal Wealth Management unit.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced Wednesday that it had hired Deborah Doyle McWhinney, a former top executive of Charles Schwab, to head the bank’s efforts to expand its Citi Personal Wealth Management unit.

headline.main: Citigroup Names Head of Personal Wealth Unit
